info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:57PM EDT until July 07 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pender County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Malpass Corner, or 7 miles southwest of Burgaw, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Penderlea, Point Caswell, Currie, Long Creek, Wards Corner, Montague, Rooks, Malpass Corner and Atkinson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
